name: Miss-ile
description:
Hello! I'm a small developer and is making a side game for fun! The game is basicilly revolved around bullethell. Things I call "Missiles" or rockets or whatever come to your spaceship left, right, and center and you (Yes YOU!) have to dodge them. Simple see? If you don't mind, can you please give me some feedback? This is my first game afterall... Anyways, why are you reading this? go and play!

Want to see a changelog? This is as close as it gets: https://trello.com/b/7frFvdVa/miss-ile-to-do-list
